text: The Minister for Foreign Affairs () is the head of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs. The current Minister for Foreign Affairs is Guðlaugur Þór Þórðarson. ==List of ministers== ===Minister for Foreign Affairs (18 November 1941 – 1 January 1970)=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan=2| ! rowspan=2| Portrait ! rowspan=2| Name ! colspan=3| Term ! rowspan=2| Political party ! rowspan=2| Cabinet |- ! Took office ! Left office ! Time in office |- | colspan=8| No minister in office between 17 January 1942 and 16 May 1942. |} ===Minister for Foreign Affairs (1 January 1970 – present)=== The Cabinet of Iceland Act no. 73/1969, which had been passed by the parliament 28 May 1969, took effect on 1 January 1970. Thus the Cabinet was formally established along with its ministries which had up until then not formally existed separately from the ministers. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan=2| ! rowspan=2| Portrait ! rowspan=2| Name ! colspan=3| Term ! rowspan=2| Political party ! rowspan=2| Cabinet |- ! Took office ! Left office ! Time in office |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Official website Foreign affairs Iceland
title: Minister for Foreign Affairs (Iceland)
